channel.title: {show off} spray can {show off}
channel.description:
Ok this is almost all primitives
here is the picture i based it from
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/6suhqp.jpg[/img]
here is is my wire frame
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/30rtytf.jpg[/img]
and here is the model
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2ivzckz.jpg[/img]
and here is a simple crown i made with primitives
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/24azygp.jpg[/img]
and here is the wire frame for crown
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/w1cx90.jpg[/img]
thanks and please put constructive criticism

item.title: {show off} spray can {show off}
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“tubefish, post:9, topic:350891”][quote author=str pk3 link=topic=447244.msg3286256#msg3286256 date=1280211728]
this is really nice u can make dragon gloves with primatives but well a really hard thing it will look like a pair of boxing gloves with spikes on em lolz i already made it didnt show it off i didnt like to show it i just have to learn modeling more well who cares, anways good job tubefish
[/quote]

thankyou i think you have the nicest comment so far[/quote]

Wtf Did You Even Read What I Said?!!?

Read full topic

item.title: {show off} spray can {show off}
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Very nice, I got a good idea for the spray can Use it as a weapon in the server and whoever wields can use the powers of ::banuser and ::mute. If you want the code then you can send me a message, I know how to do it

item.title: {show off} spray can {show off}

What coon said. You want to turn the prims into what you want. Not their basic, Homemade shape.

item.title: {show off} spray can {show off}
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

I don’t see anything wrong with the spray can, but I do find it slightly useless for a rsps. Of course that’s just my opinion, everybody has their own. Buut is right, you missed the silver trimming at the bottom and the rim that goes right above the gray cylinder.

Great start though.

Read full topic

item.title: {show off} spray can {show off}
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

I don’t see the point of why you made it. The crown is very ugly also. You also didn’t make the silver rim for the spray can.

Read full topic
